subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tobias Forsberg scored with seven seconds left Saturday to give Sweden a 4-3 victory over Canada in a world junior championship game in Pardubice, Czech Republic. The victory ended a 20-game winning streak in the world junior tournament for Canada, the three-time defending champion.In Liberec, the United States improved to 3-0 in Group B when Tyler Ruegsegger, James vanRiemsdyk and Mike Carman scored in a 3-2 victory over Russia. In other games, the Czech Republic beat Slovakia, 5-2, and Finland defeated Kazakhstan, 5-0.
